snippet: Some people on the island want to establish a nonprofit funeral service, but they are being opposed by powerful organizations representing Massachusetts’ cemeteries and funeral directors.
abstract: Closure of only funeral home on island of Nantucket, Mass, has prompted residents to try to establish nonprofit funeral service; efforts are being opposed by powerful organizations representing state's cemeteries and funeral directors, who say island's efforts could open door for other towns to set up their own funeral homes.
lead_paragraph: Some people on the island want to establish a nonprofit funeral service, but they are being opposed by powerful organizations representing Massachusetts’ cemeteries and funeral directors.

headline.main: Even on Nantucket, a Funeral Home Is a Luxury
headline.print_headline: Even on Nantucket, a Funeral Home Is a Luxury
